title: Joe Biden and the Parable of the Raisin Bran
description: A remark in a local television interview undercut the president’s message: that his administration was tackling rising prices for gasoline and groceries.
dc:creator: Blake Hounshell

media:content.media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: An offhand comment by President Biden unintentionally revealed just how inconsistent the Democratic Party’s message on inflation has come across to voters.
